summary: Create a physical fitness/physical coach website with necessary tools and core pages (Home, Tools, Contact Us, etc.).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Fitness coaching logo mark, modern minimalist (coach-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- High-energy fitness hero banner with abstract shapes and subtle texture, no text (fitness-hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of 3 simple line icons: dumbbell, stopwatch, heart/health (fitness-icons-set.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a multi-page frontend for a physical fitness / physical coach website with top navigation and routes for: Home, Tools, Contact Us, and at least one additional informational page (e.g., About or Services). All pages must be accessible via navigation and have clear page headings and sections.

Design and implement a coherent visual theme for the full website (colors, typography, spacing, buttons, cards) appropriate for a fitness coaching brand, and apply it consistently across all pages. Avoid a blue/purple primary palette unless explicitly requested later.

Implement the Home page content sections suitable for a fitness coach website, including at minimum: hero section (headline + subtext + primary call-to-action), coach/services overview, highlights/benefits section, and a call-to-action linking to Tools and Contact Us.

Build a Tools page that provides practical fitness tools implemented in the UI (no external integrations required). Include at least: BMI calculator (height/weight inputs with unit selection), daily calorie estimate calculator (basic BMR/TDEE estimate with activity level), and a simple weekly workout planner template (user fills days/exercises and can export/copy).

Create a Contact Us page with a contact form (name, email, message) including client-side validation, success/error states, and submission to the backend for storage. Also display basic contact information blocks (e.g., email/phone placeholders) and optional business hours.
Add a basic footer and standard site layout elements (header/nav + footer) reused across pages, including links to Home, Tools, Contact Us, and the additional informational page.
Add a lightweight on-site SEO/accessibility baseline: set meaningful page titles per route, ensure form inputs have labels, and ensure main sections use semantic headings.
Add generated static image assets to support the fitness coach theme and render them in the UI (served from frontend/public/assets/generated), including a logo and a home hero banner image.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a physical fitness/physical coach website with core pages (Home, Tools, Contact Us, etc.).
Backend: implement data models and actor methods to store and retrieve Contact Us submissions. Each stored inquiry must include: id, name, email, message, and createdAt timestamp.

projectName: Physical Fitness / Coach Website with Home, Tools, and Contact Pages
